explanation: [0-0] A girl in a white dress is standing barefoot on the concrete ground of a yard, pulling on a long rope. The other end of the rope is not in the frame. In the background, there are some trees, stones, and some debris piled up.

[0-5] The girl in the white dress pulls the rope and leaves the frame. A boy enters from the left side of the frame. He is wearing a green shirt and blue shorts, slippers on his feet, also holding the rope and walking to the right.
